p: Proximate composition of the defatted conophor nut flour and the protein isolate was determined according to the standard procedures of Association of Official Analytical Chemists (AOAC, 1990). The micro Kjeldahl nitrogen method was used in the determination of the crude protein content. A conversion factor of 6.25 was used to convert the nitrogen content to protein. The carbohydrate content was determined by difference (100 − [moisture + total ash + crude fat + crude fiber + protein]).
